application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Supplementary Information V2, Cornerstone - Local Authority Engagement Brochure - Sept 2020, Cornerstone GPDO Application Letter (England) V.5, Cornerstone Health and Mobile Phone Base Stations Document V.4, Cornerstone ICNIRP Declaration with Clarification Letter V.4, Cornerstone Planning Developers Notice (England) V.5, Coverage and Capacity v11, Developers Notice Letter and POD, Digital Public Benefit Brochure Sept 2020, GPDO General Background Info for Telecoms Dev, Mobile Phones and Health Research Reviews v16, MobileUK Health Fact Sheet V1, Planning for Telecommunications v6, Supplementary Information, Dwg 100 Rev A (Location Plan), Dwg 200 Rev A (Existing Site Plan), Dwg 201 Rev B (Proposed Site Plan), Dwg 300 Rev A (Existing South Elevation), Dwg 301 Rev B (Proposed South Elevation), Dwg 302 Rev A (Existing East Elevation), Dwg 303 Rev A (Proposed East Elevation), Dwg 304 Rev A (Existing North Elevation), Dwg 305 Rev A (Proposed North Elevation), Dwg 306 Rev A (Existing West Elevation), Dwg 307 Rev A (Proposed West Elevation)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Prior Approval (Telecommunications) for The proposed installation of 6 no antennas on 3 new tripods, installation of 2 dishes and new steelwork housing 2 racks with ancillary development thereto. The height of the proposed antennas being 33.1m with the length of the supporting steelworks being 5.0m and 3.5m.
